lyrics: Tonight ふたりでTonight この宵Tonight I rememberLast Christmas EveTonight この愛Tonight 夢みたTonight 幸福を星祈る銀色の街にいつか抱かれ悲しみも遠く消えてTonight 見つめてTonight あなたをTonight I rememberLast Christmas Eve過ぎた日を悔やんでみても昨日さ涙さえ遠く消えてTonight ふたりでTonight この宵Tonight I rememberLast Christmas Eve
translated_lyrics: Tonight, Tonight, Tonight I, rememberLast Christmas EveTonight, this love Tonight, Tonight, Tonight, Tonight, a dream of happiness, in a silver street praying for a star, and sorrow is too far away, Tonight, Tonight, Tonight, you can be Tonight I rememberLast Christmas. Eve: I'm sorry for the past day, but yesterday, even the tear is gone. Tonight, Tonight, Tonight, Tonight I, rememberLast Christmas Eve,
